Mentoring got you down? Newbies running circles around you? We're here to listen.

"what should i tell mentees that ask this?" "why do all my mentees run away?" "how can i tell my mentee they're a bad writer?"

Please note that the group is not for general chatter, it is a helpline...

Group membership for mentors is optional. If you wish to be taken out of the group but remain a mentor, requests can be sent directly to [wertperch], [creases], or [Apatrix]. If you want to become a mentor or quit mentoring, please contact a member of the [mch] group.

[{linkGroupMessages}]
